resources.string:
Be-Gain is app developed based on Android application, its a educational app application from where user can learn basic things about python. Initially we have limited scope for Be-Gain application which is within Gyalpozhing, and in later parts we are going to extend scope as far demand of our project from user. Be-Gain is only for python programming language, it is e-learning platform which has objectives like easy learning for learners, diversification of knowledge on python. Be-Gain focuses on python because python is one of the highly rated plus most used programming language among many other programming language.


Aim:

Aim is to develop an application for e-learning where learners can access courses on python. 

Objective:

The objective of our project is to provide a platform for interested learners to start their programming journey through simple and informative self learning. Further persue of any knowledge requires proper basic which we aim to provide for our learners.


 Contact: be-gain.gcit@rub.edu.bt
